---
title: "EPL"
theme: 
  - Lux
type: default 
---


```{r}
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
base_dir <- "."

md_dirs <- list.dirs(base_dir, recursive = FALSE, full.names = FALSE)
md_dirs <- md_dirs[grepl("^MD\\s+\\d+$", md_dirs)]
md_dirs <- md_dirs[order(as.numeric(sub("^MD\\s+", "", md_dirs)))]

links <- vapply(md_dirs, function(md) {
  docs <- file.path(base_dir, md, "Docs")
  if (!dir.exists(docs)) return(NA_character_)
  html <- list.files(docs, pattern = "\\.html$", full.names = FALSE)
  if (length(html) == 0) return(NA_character_)
  html <- sort(html)[1]

  path <- file.path(md, "docs", html)
  path <- gsub("\\\\", "/", path)
  url <- utils::URLencode(path)
  sprintf("- [%s](%s)", md, url)
}, character(1))

links <- links[!is.na(links)]
cat(paste(links, collapse = "\n"), "\n")
```
